pair.title: Pair Broadlink Device
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the fields.
pair.invalidsettings: Please use correct format for address and mac
pair.intro:
Configure the device with the e-Control app on a smartphone.
Get the IP address from your wifi router.
pair.error_no_discover: No device discovered. Did you switch it on, and is it connectect to your WiFi network ?

settings.title: Broadlink Debug Settings
settings.intro: In compatibility mode, any device found during pairing will be accepted as the selected device type. This means the device paired will be treated as the choosen device type. As a result, not all (if any) of the capablities of the device will work properly
